Customer Management

:

Create Customer

: This function allows users to create new customer profiles with relevant information.

Pending Customer

: Manages customer profiles that are in a pending state, likely awaiting approval or additional information.

Rejected Customer

: Deals with customer profiles that have been rejected for some reason.

Modify Customer

: Allows users to update and edit customer information as needed.

View Customer

: Displays customer details for reference.

Delete Customer

: Removes customer profiles from the system.

Update Customer File

: Enables the updating of customer-related files.

Upload Customer File

: Allows users to upload files or documents associated with specific customers.

Pending Transfer

: Manages customer transfers that are pending approval.

Create Transfer

: Facilitates the initiation of customer transfers.

Customer Event Config

: Configures various events related to customers.

Pending Customer Event Config

: Manages pending configurations for customer events.

Delete Customer Event Config

: Removes customer event configurations.

Modify Customer Event Config

: Updates configurations for customer events.

View Customer Event Config

: Displays configurations for customer events.

Application Management

:

Principal Card Application Management

: Handles applications for principal cardholders, likely involving approval or rejection processes.

Supplementary Card Application

: Manages applications for supplementary (additional) cardholders.

Corporate Application

: Manages applications for corporate cards, often used by businesses.

Application Inquiry

: Provides the ability to inquire about the status or details of card applications.

Credit Card Management

:

Card Create

: Initiates the creation of new credit card profiles.

Modify Card

: Allows updates to credit card information, such as contact details or credit limits.

Pending Card

: Manages credit card requests that are pending approval.

Generate PIN

: Generates Personal Identification Numbers (PINs) for credit cards.

Print PIN

: Prints PINs for credit cards.

Regenerate PIN

: Re-generates PINs for credit cards, often in cases of forgotten or compromised PINs.

Reprint PIN

: Reprints PINs for credit cards.

Suspend Card

: Temporarily suspends the functionality of credit cards.

Revoke Card

: Revokes the authorization or validity of credit cards.

Activate Revoked Card

: Re-activates credit cards that were previously revoked.

Close Card

: Closes credit card accounts, effectively terminating them.

Pending Delete Card

: Manages pending requests to delete credit card profiles.

Activate Card

: Activates newly issued or reactivated credit cards.

Change Card Limit

: Allows users to modify credit card spending limits.

Pending Card Limit Change

: Manages pending requests to change card spending limits.

Regenerate Card

: Reissues or regenerates credit cards.

Pending Regenerate

: Manages pending requests for card reissuance.

Change Account Limits

: Modifies account-related limits.

Pending Account Limit Change

: Manages pending requests to change account limits.

Change Account Profile

: Updates account profiles.

Pending Account Profile Change

: Manages pending changes to account profiles.

Debit Card Management

(Functions similar to Credit Card Management, but for debit cards).

Store Value Card Management

(Functions similar to Credit Card Management, with additional features for top-ups and card linking).

Card Payment

:

Add Payment

: Allows users to add payments to card accounts.

Pending Payment

: Manages payments that are pending approval.

Reject Payment

: Handles the rejection of card payments.

View Payment

: Displays details of card payments.

Delete Payment

: Removes payment records from the system.

Card Renewals

:

Renew Card

: Initiates the renewal process for card accounts.

Pending Card Renewals

: Manages card renewal requests that are pending approval.

Reject Card Renewals

: Handles the rejection of card renewal requests.

Generate PIN for Renewed Card

: Generates new PINs for cards that have been renewed.

Print PIN for Renewed Card

: Prints new PINs for renewed cards.

Activate Renewed Card

: Activates cards that have been renewed.

View Card Renewal

: Allows users to view details of card renewal transactions.

Delete Card Renewal

: Removes card renewal records from the system.

Pending Delete Card Renewals

: Manages pending requests to delete card renewal records.

Common Card Function

:

Download Encode File

: Downloads encoded files, often used for data transfer or processing.

Regenerate Encode File

: Re-generates encoded files.

Re-download Encode File

: Downloads encoded files again.

Manual Fee Posting

: Manually posts fees to card accounts.

Fee Exception

: Manages exceptions related to fees associated with card accounts.

Maintenance

:

Card Product

: Manages card product information, including configuration and updates.

Activity View

: Provides views of activity logs, often for auditing purposes.

Question/Answer

: Handles questions and answers, likely used for customer support or inquiries.

Crib Report

: Generates crib reports, possibly for internal analysis or compliance purposes.

Company

: Manages company-related information.

Card Flow Location

: Monitors the location or flow of cards within the system.

Call Centre Management

: Manages call center-related functions.

Notification Setup

: Sets up notifications, likely for alerts or updates.

Download ACS File

: Downloads ACS (Access Control Server) files.

Visa Upload

: Uploads data related to Visa transactions or processing.

Card Utility Management

:

Add Utility to Card

: Adds utilities (services or features) to card accounts.

Pending Utility to Card

: Manages pending requests to add utilities to card accounts.

Modify Utility to Card

: Updates utility information associated with card accounts.

Delete Utility from Card

: Removes utilities from card accounts.

Pending Deleted Utility from Card

: Manages pending requests to delete utilities from card accounts.

Card Inventory

:

Inactivate Batch

: Disables batches of cards.

Create Card Batch

: Generates new batches of cards.

Pending Card Batches

: Manages pending requests for card batches.

Generate PIN

: Generates PINs for cards.

Print PIN

: Prints PINs for cards.

Reprint PIN

: Reprints PINs for cards.

Assign Card Branch

: Assigns cards to specific branches.

Batch Splitting

: Splits card batches, possibly for distribution.

Batch Splitting Approve

: Approves batch splitting requests.

Inquiry Card Batch

: Inquires about card batches.

Confirm Card Batch

: Confirms the status of card batches.

Create Card Number

: Generates new card numbers.

Re-assign Card Branch

: Reassigns cards to different branches.

Transaction Inquiry

:

Transaction Details

: Provides detailed information about specific card transactions.

Report

:

Card Report

: Generates reports related to card accounts.

Customer Report

: Generates reports related to customer profiles.

Transaction Report

: Creates reports on card transactions.

CSS Report

: Generates reports related to the Cambodian

Sheair

Switch (CSS).

Letters

: Manages templates and generation of letters, often for customer communication.

Card Inquiry

:

Card and Customer Detail

: Provides detailed information about both card accounts and associated customer profiles.

View Report

:

Card Report

: Allows users to view reports related to card accounts.

Customer Report

: Allows users to view reports related to customer profiles.

Transaction Report

: Provides access to view reports on card transactions.

Letters

: Allows users to view letter templates and generated letters.

Audit

:

Add/Remove Table to Audit

: Manages tables used for auditing purposes, typically adding or removing tables.

View Data in Audit Table

: Provides access to view data stored in audit tables.

Modify Audit Table

: Allows modifications to audit tables, often for customization or compliance reasons.

Call Centre Inquiry

:

Call and Customer Detail

: Displays details of calls and associated customer information, typically identified by card numbers or identification information.

CSS (Cambodia

Sheair

Switch)

:

CSS Transaction Inquiry

: Provides the ability to inquire about transactions processed through the Cambodian

Sheair

Switch (CSS), likely for monitoring or auditing purposes.

Update

Prelinked

Card

:

Card and Customer Detail

: Allows updates to card and customer details, including card number, name on card, card type, product type, core banking number, and more.

Update

Corebanking

:

Card and Customer Detail

: Provides the ability to update card and customer details, including card number, name on card, card type, product type, core banking number, and other core banking-related information. This function likely facilitates synchronization between the card system and the core banking system.
